item.title: Rust Drivers In Linux 6.19 Will Now Support... Module Parameters

item.title: Korea to Treat Crypto Exchanges Like Banks After Upbit Hack
item.description:
South Korea is moving to treat major crypto exchanges like traditional banks following November's $30.1 million Upbit hack, with planned regulations requiring platforms to compensate users for security breaches and system failures regardless of fault.

The post Korea to Treat Crypto Exchanges Like Banks After Upbit Hack appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin Playbook Backfires on 100+ Companies
item.description:
Over 100 publicly traded companies that adopted Michael Saylor's Bitcoin treasury model now face a 43% median stock decline as massive debt obligations collide with crypto holdings that generate no cash flow to service payments.
